tasks.title: Registration
tasks.description: User can register himself/herself using emailID or social accounts.

tasks.title: Profile
tasks.description: User can create a profile and add his experiences, education, personal information.

tasks.title: Settings
tasks.description: User can set manage passwords, account details etc.

tasks.title: Reset Passwords
tasks.description: User can reset the password by providing his current password, new password, confirm password.
